description: Stephen Harte is working overtime when an unexpected delivery is made to his office. Much to his surprise, Stephen discovered a vast collection of black dildos in the package. But why play with something fake when you can have the real thing? Black Pearl has a huge black dick between his legs, and Stephen services it with his mouth and ass.
title: Stephen Harte Rides Black Pearl’s Big Black Dick
